Package utilities

Class Summary
Angle The class contains helper methods for finding the principle angle & the minimum Angle The code is modified from the Odometer given in Lab 4
BluetoothTransmission This class will open a bluetooth connection to the PC server.
Communicator This class will communicate with the slave NXT and initialize the ports on it.
Map Not implemented! This class would ideally like to map out objects of interest as picked up by the ultrasonic sensors during navigation.
Point Helper class that uses a Point object to store a points x and y coordinates.
Position Using the Point class as a base, Position adds an angle theta.
Settings Contains most of the Motor/Sensor port settings, Physical Robot Parameters and match settings
Tile This class provides the functionality of a tile, specific for different zones of interest to the robot.
 

Enum Summary
StartingCorner Identifier for the four starting corners
